tool.name: HRV Indexes Multiple Windows

param.name: j
param.label: Moving interval in seconds for centering new windows set (0=each beat)

tool.help: Calculate HRV indexes using windows of WINMIN:WINSTEP:WINMAX length (or WINSIZEs length) and jumping by JUMP Columns of indexes calculated with new winsize are added to older column. Adds suffix '_winsize' to label names.
